# ESA 2024

Find me at the Ecological Society of America Meeting 2024 in Long Beach, CA where I will help organize the Special Session *Towards equity in the communication of science: harnessing the power of AI for an inclusive tomorrow*. 

I will also be giving a talk about my work in my native language (Spanish).
